title: THE SUN

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If partisans spawn, they gain the additional goal to protect you, and you gain access to the factional chat. If you die, partisans have 5 days to win and avenge their god
-The Town is notified that you are the sun
-You cannot be hanged
-You may not vote or whisper, however all your day messages come through as “The voice of the sun”
-If someone is insane enough to attack the sun, you will explode, killing X amount of non-partisan players, where X is the number of attackers against you multiplied by 3 as well as your attacker
-Smitted players have their roles and wills incinerated

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the partisans/you

desc:

_I SMITE THEE WITH THE UNMATCHED POWER OF THE SUN_
